newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks close lower amid profit taking.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks close lower amid profit taking.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed lower as retail investors booked profit on blue chip shares, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index fell 22.36 points or 1.23 percent at 1,781.73 on a turnover of 125.7 million taka. Friday is the weekend in Bangladesh. Of 125 traded issues, 35 gained and 86 lost.

Brokers said market sentiment was positive and investors wanted to cash in gains from rises over the past few sessions. Singer Bangladesh shed 151 to 13,117, Shine Pukur rose 6.0 to 295 and Usmani Glass Sheet was down 141 to 1,403.
